long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adilar sourcing tool for Chrome makes your talent acquisition even more faster!

How to use: When you visit a potential candidates profile in Social networks and Media just click on the Adilar icon in the top right of the browser, you'll have the opportunity to import (source) their profile information on one or more of your job positions & talent pools in Adilar.


Features:
- Import candidates with one click
- Extract data into candidate profiles
- Assigne candidates to jobs or talent pools
